featured.text: Then in 1834, tea cultivation began in India and spread to Sri Lanka, Thailand, Burma, and other areas of Southeast Asia.

definition.zh_def: 斯里，通常用作尊稱或敬稱，特別是在南亞地區。
definition.en_def: A title of respect or honor, often used in South Asia.
definition.example: He was referred to as Sri during the ceremony.
